titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

body.ab:
1937 de Vienna VIENNE
Mlle. Mathieu 3. Boulevard de la Tour Maubrruurg 7th.
1v. 3m. 40.00. Deposit. 30.00. refunded June 11: March 9 Tennyson. Stopford Brooke. Mar. 23 23 Sparkenbroke _ Mar. 25 25 Public Faces renewed April 8th. April 12. April 12. Short History of the English People April 28 " 28 Vanity Fair May 12 12 Rob Roy May 28 28. Dodsworth. June 4 June 4 Night & Day June 11 returned deposit 30fr June 11 going to country will return winter Jan 8th 50fr. Sub. for 3 mos Paid 1938 30fr. Deposit Paid ref. June 29 1938 Ade Vienne Jan. 8th The Final Struggle Jan. 18 Jan. 18 Mrs. Dalloway Jan 22 Jan 22 An Unsocial Socialist x Febr. 1 Febr. 1 Point counter Point (2 copy) Febr. 15. Febr. 14 Thoreau. poet. Works. Febr. 15 Of Human Bondage March 1 March 1 Jesting Pilate Mar. 15 15 Chains Mar. 29 29 Beauchamps Career _ April 14
April 14 Punch and Judy Apr 26 " 26 Painted Veil May 3 May 3 Egoist 2 vols June 7 will renew next time (expired April 8th Renewed Apr 8 - July 8 65 francs
June 7 Cakes and Ale June 15 June 15 Pleasant Plays June 29
